price: 55. Met Hem, span dus tegen mij samen en geef mij geen uitstel.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
